## Getting Started

<Steps>
  <Step>Extract the template files</Step>
  ```bash
  unzip portfolio-pro.zip
  cd portfolio-pro
  ```

  <Step>Install dependencies</Step>
  ```bash
  pnpm install
  ```

  <Step>Set up environment variables</Step>
  ```bash
  cp .env.example .env.local
  ```
  Update the variables in `.env.local` with your:
  - Sanity project credentials
  - Email service configuration
  - Analytics tracking IDs
  - Social media links

  <Step>Configure Sanity CMS</Step>
  ```bash
  cd sanity-studio
  pnpm install
  pnpm dev
  ```
  Visit `http://localhost:3333` to set up your content management system.

  <Step>Start the development server</Step>
  ```bash
  pnpm dev
  ```

  <Step>Customize and deploy</Step>
  Open [http://localhost:3000](http://localhost:3000) to see your portfolio. Customize the content, colors, and components to match your brand.
</Steps>
